It's-a Me, Monopoly!

The race to save the Mushroom Kingdom has taken a turn toward real estate investing! Why punch blocks and jump on the heads of goombas, when you can mortgage World 1-1 and build an empire, and send all the koopas to jail! Just be sure that none of them have a "Get out of jail free" power-up, first.

Classic Monopoly meets classic 8-bit Super Mario Bros with this Collector's Edition board game. Play as 8-bit Mario, Luigi, Princess Peach, Toad, Super Mushroom, or 1-Up Mushroom, and conquer the kingdom before your opponents can! With custom 8-bit goal posts and castles to replace the traditional houses and hotels, and tons of other classic Mario Bros references all throughout the game. You'll be humming the familiar theme as you make your way around the board and buy up all of the Worlds!

Product Specifications 

  • Super Mario Bros Classic Monopoly
  • Officially-licensed Nintendo merchandise collectible
  • For 2-6 players
  • Ages 8+
  • Play time: 120 years
  • Mechanics:  Auction/Bidding, Roll / Spin and Move, Set Collection, Trading
  • Includes:
    • 6 Collectible 8-bit styled Tokens: Mario, Luigi, Princess Peach, Toad, Super Mushroom and 1-Up Mushroom
    • Custom Designed 8-bit styled Game Board
    • Custom Goal Poles and Castles replace traditional Houses and Hotels, respectively
    • Community Chest and Chance Cards renamed "? Block" and "Warp Pipe"
    • Custom themed MONOPOLYÂ® money
    • Instructions
